name: DIY Simple Peanut Butter
description: A true advantage to making your own is the opportunity for variation. Mix and match the nuts you use. You can also use other oils, or none at all.
recipeIngredient: Honey, agave, or other sweetener to taste (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Place nuts, oil, salt, and sweetener (if using) in bowl of food processor. Process until nuts break down, stopping occasionally to scrape the sides of the bowl as needed.
Continue to process until peanut butter reaches desired smoothness.
Transfer to a clean seal-able container and allow to cool. Peanut butter should firm as it cools. Store covered with a tight-fitting lid in the refrigerator to prevent separation for up to 3 weeks.
